header_desc: Whether you're going on a first date or the 10th, there's more to choosing a good restaurant than just the food. With that in mind, Fika and our team of foodies and daters were sure to account for ambiance and top-notch service when curating this list of Social Spot Recommendations.

seo.title: Best social spots for dating and social events
seo.description: Lots of interesting places with special discounts for you to choose for your date night or social events with friends
